I've written code to write forms to a Database, each form must have an indi=
vidual
Id number, which is hard coded in. Junit is perfect for testing this=
 once.


However if I wish to use a performance test on this (say a JunitPe=
rf, Load
Test to send multiple forms concurrently) this wont work, as the I=
D numbers
which need too be unique are all the same, so previously exist in=
 the database,
causing an error.

Is there an aspect of JunitPerf/Junit tha=
t allows for multiple test to be
preformed when each individual test involv=
es unique data?

Does anyone know a meethod around this?

Thank you :)
